#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    long long int a[n];
    long long int dp[n];
    for(int i = 0;i < n;i++) cin >> a[i];
    for(int i = 0;i < n;i++) dp[i] = -1;
    dp[0] = 0;
    for(long long int i = 1;i < n;i++) {
            for(long long int j = 1;i-j >= 0;j=j*2) {
                    long long int k = a[i]-a[i-j];
                    if(k < 0) k *= (-1);
                    if(dp[i] == -1) dp[i] = dp[i-j] + k;
                    dp[i] = min(dp[i],k+dp[i-j]);
            }
    }
    cout << dp[n-1] << endl;
    return 0;
}
